sentences.sentence: We will have to put some effort in if we hope to become regular imbibers.
sentences.translation: 我们将不得不把一些努力，如果我们希望成为定期客喝酒。

sentences.sentence: Careless distillation in many a backwoods still has caused it to blind the imbibers of "alternative" alcoholic drinks.
sentences.translation: 在一些偏远地区，蒸馏时不小心残留下的甲醇仍在导致饮用“替代”酒精饮料的贪杯者失明。
